innhold.avsnitt: You may only apply for parental benefit when the child has been born.

You may start your parental benefit period from the seventh week after the birth. If you do not wish to start withdrawing parental benefit from week seven, you must document that the mother is in approved activity so as not to lose days

To apply, log in using your BankID system from your bank or another approved electronic ID. The questions asked in the application are adapted to your situation, and instructions and information are provided as you fill in the form.
In the application, you will be asked to attach documentation that meet requirement for the mothers activity.

lesmer.intro: Have you received a severance package, interim pay or been in compulsory military service?
lesmer.avsnitt: You must submit documentation of your income and the period if you have had one of these sources of income:

liste.punkt: compulsory military service or the Norwegian Civil Defence
salary from employer during further or continuing education

lesmer.intro: Is the mother receiving disability benefit?

innhold.lesmer: If the mother is sick or hospitalised in a hospital or health care institution, you may apply for parental benefit before the child is born. In this case, you must send the application by post.
